item.description: Module 1 lecture notes with two focused activities and a revised diagnostic writing prompt.

item.title: 批判性思维与英语写作（二）｜Critical Thinking and English Writing II — Syllabus
item.description: 18-week syllabus for third-year English majors focusing on argumentation, critical thinking, exposition, and responsible AI use.
